roleset.name: to entice or lure by flattery
roleset.note: INVEIGLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'inveigle' based on dictionary.com. Verbnet entry 59. (from inveigle.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: Again and again, by feint of foot and hand and body he-1 continued *PRO*-1 to inveigle Sandel into leaping back, ducking, or countering.
example.arg: by feint of foot and hand and body
into leaping back, ducking, or countering.
